titles.title: To develop model curricula appropriate for elementary and secondary students.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committee.name: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities

bill.summary: 4/16/1996--Introduced. Amends Federal law relating to the establishment of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council to add to the Council's functions the development of model curricula, appropriate for children in kindergarten through 12th grade, that shall be made available to a school upon request.
